channel.title: Miasmic barrage
channel.description: Hey guys i replaced my shadow barrage with miasmic barrage lol. Everything worked fine now i just need toknow, how would i ONLY be able to cast the spell wearing a certain staff? [img]http://cdn.makeagif.com/media/1-09-2014/T4uiYs.gif[/img]

item.title: Miasmic barrage
item.dc:creator: @cammyPVPftw cammyPVPftw
item.description:
@cammyPVPftw wrote:

Thanks for the help but i just added my own method. Thanks for the feedback mate :D.

Read full topic

item.title: Miasmic barrage
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

For Project Insanity:
Open CombatAssistant and locate checkMagicReqs(int spells) and inside of the first if-statement add the following code and replace the ALL CAPS with the proper data.

if (spell == YOUR_SPELL && c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] != STAFF_ID) { c.sendMessage("You can only cast this spell with ....."); return false; }

But it would be helpful to know what base you’re using because if that’s Delta or Allstar the above would never work.

Read full topic
